rooms.description: A welcoming space with north facing entrance ensuring positive Vastu energy flow.
Spacious Mediterranean style living room with ample natural light and comfortable seating arrangement.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for communal dining experiences in a Mediterranean vibe.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with functional layout and integrated appliances.
Cozy guest room located near the entrance for easy access, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and enhanced privacy. Vastu alignment ensures good sleep quality.
